hero.title: Make an impact
hero.content: Swarm grants support many interesting projects that are already building their products on top of Swarm. Swarm bounties extend the ecosystem with tooling and infrastructure.

items.title: Swarm Grant Waves
items.content:
The purpose of Swarm grant waves is to enable developers, researchers, the community and artists to get to know Swarm and start exploring by creating proof(s)-of-concept, and MVPs that showcase their vision. This is just the start of collaboration. Those who successfully reach their milestones can apply for follow-up grants.

If you have any questions regarding the process, reach out to the Swarm team on Discord.

items.title: Build on Swarm
items.content: Find a list of current grantees below. Yours could be next.

features.title: Etherna
features.content: Etherna is building a decentralised video sharing platform to bring a fair data economy to creators, curators and fans.

features.title: Dapplets
features.content: Dapplets aims to leverage target websites’ search results to pull data previously uploaded to Swarm, providing an interface for data interchange between the Dapplet and the search result provider.

features.title: Copyright Delta
features.content: Copyright Delta wants to make it easy for copyright owners to host their own nodes on Ethereum Swarm and use it for digital rights management, administration and verification.

features.title: BrainTrip
features.content: BrainTrip aims to become the main system for storing brain waves data gathered with EEG by offering a decentralised screening solution through Fairdrive.

features.title: GetLoginEth
features.content: GetLoginEth is a Dapp for providing a decentralised single sign-on solution for Ethereum-based social applications.

features.title: Envelop DAO
features.content: Envelop DAO offers a collateral-backed and price-discovery cross-chain protocol to provide NFTs with intrinsic value and liquidity that will increase with every transaction.

features.title: Iqracrypto
features.content: The goal is to become the first online eLearning platform to train and educate professionals in cryptocurrencies and blockchain technology in the MENA Reg.

features.title: Open Social Network
features.content: By building on Swarm, OSN creates a censorship-resistant, permissionless and decentralised social media platform.

features.title: SocialArchive
features.content: SocialArchive allows users to store their own data, giving them sovereignty to keep it from and/or integrate it with other services if they wish to do so.

features.title: Laibach X Swarm Decentralisation of art
features.content: By producing NFTs on Swarm, group Laibach is launching a social experiment that tackles the question of possibility in decentralised art, understanding it as a new form of creativity and playful interaction within a closed society.

features.title: Personium
features.content: An interconnectable open source PDS (Personal Data Store) server envisioning a world wide web of protected data APIs.

features.title: MemeZzz
features.content: A meme-generator on Swarm. The goal is an entertainment platform where users can store, publish and view memes that are saved in Swarm and aligned with Fair Data Society principles.

features.title: Hashd0x by Egor Kraft
features.content: The purpose of the Hashd0x installation is to start and facilitate a wider dialogue on the importance of spoof proof evidence collection and tools for open source investigations, so that democracy does not slide into tyranny.

features.title: FEDn
features.content: FEDn is an open-source federated learning solution initiated and currently maintained by Scaleout. Federated learning enables machine learning without moving, pooling or disclosing data.

features.title: Trilateral Research
features.content: The research will develop guiding principles for a commons approach to distributed file storage. The approach will be based on the Swarm base layer of the Ethereum stack.

features.title: Zoomerok
features.content: Zoomerok is a mobile app with short entertainment videos stored on Swarm and you’re in control of your privacy and data.

features.title: Ready Fighter One
features.content: Ready Fighter One wants to take real boxing to the virtual world, starting with a mini-app that connects to the Fairdrive personal data store.

features.title: Grassroots Economics
features.content: Grassroots Economics is a non-profit foundation that seeks to empower marginalised communities to take charge of their own livelihoods and economic future.

features.title: Atelier Ludensis
features.content: Atelier Ludensis is developing a Proof of Concept to link NFT streaming content via a semantic web-based multi-dimensional UX, visually linking the NFTs to relevant semantic nodes. Will there be a new ERC?

features.title: EnergonX
features.content: EnergonX builds a fair hydrogen location-aware trading platform system. EnergonX aims to use the grant to implement the storage and retrieval of Production Certificates and Guarantees of Origin on Swarm. Clean energy is the new deal.

features.title: Waggle
features.content: A spam-free, secure and decentralized email service on top of Swarm, inspired by the idea of a mail-transfer protocol proposed by Daniel J. Bernstein in which the sender, and not the recipient, is responsible for storing the email messages.

features.title: VideoWiki
features.content: VideoWiki is a democratized, tokenized, AI-based immersive content creation platform capable of rewarding millions of digital content creators.

features.title: Bittopia
features.content: Bittopia is a Decentralized Autonomous University and leverages open curriculums, blockchains, and decentralised technologies like Swarm to tokenize the successful transfer of knowledge from mentor to student.

features.title: AgorApp
features.content: AgorApp is an e-training platform that allows you to learn Web3 development paired with an AI-driven skills-matching marketplace. Finding the perfect match between enterprises and talented developers.

features.title: Sovr
features.content: Sovr extends the compute capabilities of the FairOS-dfs by integrating toolings of the Golem network. The idea is to offer people compute pods: recipes for setting up, running, and finally collecting the results of a dapp execution session. Users can fork, share, and modify compute pods in an easy and intuitive manner.

features.title: Liquichain
features.content: An EVM-based communities focused blockchain, using Swarm as its storage layer.
